      class  Expression
      Represents a semantic object that corresponds to a coreferential mention, such as an anaphor or a cataphor.
      Methods in gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core with parameters of type Term 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.LinkedHashSet<CoreferenceChain> CoreferenceChain.getChainsWithAnaphor(Term term)
      Finds the anaphora chains where the given term acts as the anaphor.
      static CoreferenceChain CoreferenceChain.getChainWithAnaphor(Term term)
      Finds the anaphora chain that includes the given term as the anaphor.
